DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objective : - To reclassify histologic grade serous ovarian cancer specimens patient enrol Gynecologic Oncology Group ( GOG ) protocol 158 use two-tier system . Secondary Objective : - To determine overall progression-free survival patient serous carcinoma ovary treat GOG protocol 158 reclassify accord tumor grade ( low vs. high ) . DOC.brief_title: Ancillary Study GOG 158 : Survival Analysis Based Reclassification Two-Tier Grading System
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study describe progression-free overall survival patient treat GOG protocol 158 tumor reclassify two-tier grading system . Although universal grade system exists , Malpica et al . recently publish data clinically meaningful two-tier grading system serous ovarian carcinoma ( Malpica et al. , American Journal Surgical Pathology , 2004 ) . Tumor grade show important prognostic factor woman epithelial ovarian cancer , especially early stage carcinoma . While less consensus regard prognostic significance grade late stage tumor , researcher note patient low-grade advanced disease may longer survival high-grade lesion ( Bodurka-Bevers et al. , Gynecologic Oncology , 2000 ) .
DOC.criteria: All patient enrol GOG protocol 158 diagnosis serous carcinoma ovary .
